meaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>fingers</radical>, put them on this <radical>turtle shell</radical>, and <kanji>push</kanji> push push! Push the turtle right on out of there.
readingMnemonic: You're trying to <kanji>push</kanji> this turtle out so you can use the shell for your new <reading>o</reading>bi (お). You keep seeing other people wearing turtle shell patterns on their obi, but you're going to go a step further. You're going to MAKE your obi out of actual turtle shells! You just have to push this darn turtle out first.
